## âœ¨ Aadhyatm Kya Hai?

Aadhyatm aatma ka gyaan hai â€” apni aatma ke swabhav ko jaanna aur samajhna hi aadhyatm hai. Koi ise yoga ke madhyam se samajhta hai, to koi ise aatma-chintan aur aatma-gyaan ki vidhiyon se.

Aadhyatm ko apnane ke liye budhape tak intezaar karna zaruri nahi hai. Jitna jaldi insaan aadhyatm ko samajh le, utna hi uska jeevan sahaj, santulit aur shaktishaali ho jata hai.

Aadhyatm koi aisi cheez nahi hai jo aap par thopi gayi ho. Yeh to apne aap ko jaanne aur pehchanne ki prakriya hai. Vaastav mein, khud ko jaanna jeevan ka sabse mahatvapurn kaam hai. Har wo insaan jo ek santulit aur meaningful jeevan jeena chahta hai, uske liye aadhyatm ko apnana aavashyak hai.

Aadhyatm ke anek fayde hain â€” yeh tan-man ko tanavmukt karta hai, nisswaarth prem sikhata hai, satyata aur imaandari se jeena sikhata hai, hamari soch aur samajhne ka nazariya badal deta hai. Yeh humein dukh aur kathinaiyon mein bhi kuch accha dekhne ki drishti deta hai. Aadhyatm se humare andar samarpan aur sweekar ki bhaavna vikasit hoti hai.

Aur sabse mahatvapurn baat â€” aadhyatm hume apne aap se milata hai, yaani hamare asli swaroop se.
